title: 6 Lies People Believe About Divine Healing
description: This book will help you destroy the traditions of man and lies of religion that nullify the power of God in your life!What we believe about God and how He works can have a dramatic impact on how we approach Him and what we expect of Him. Many believers believe lies about Him that keep them bound and prevent healing in their bodies and in their lives. In this short ebook you'll learn what some of the top lies are that hold Christians and unbelievers back when it comes to divine healing.Stop believing lies. Healing is within your grasp!
author: Steve Bremner
